thread.title: Girl who says lottery ruined her life can’t catch a break
thread.title_full: Girl who says lottery ruined her life can’t catch a break | New York Post

author: Douglas Walker, The Sun
title: Girl who says lottery ruined her life can’t catch a break
text:
A lotto millionaire was in shock last night after it emerged thieves are trying to sell personal pictures hacked from her Snapchat account .
A Twitter user, calling himself @Assignments, has approached reporters and demanded £1,000 for snaps of Jane Park .
He wrote: “I even managed to recover some personal images of Jane from her Snapchat moments and chat messages, if you’d be interested in seeing those?
“I got them when I hacked into her Snapchat account.
“I’m quite reasonable. There are a total of four pictures. Was thinking close to 4 figures via PayPal friend & family.”
SEE ALSO 
My life sucks since winning the lottery 0:0 Poor little rich girl. The youngest person ever to win... The tweet also said that he had hacked her personal chats on social media.
It emerged last week that 21-year-old Jane’s account had been hacked.
A personal photo from her account has already been shared online.
She told how cyber creeps had demanded money to hand back control of her Snapchat.
Sources claimed Jane, of Edinburgh — who scooped a £1million EuroMillions payout when just 17 — called in cops. But police had no report.
